mobile-phones.name: Apple iPhone 11 Pro 256GB
mobile-phones.description: Latest iPhone model, with 256GB storage capacity.
features: 5.8-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display
Water and dust resistance (4 metres for up to 30 minutes, IP68)
Triple-camera system with 12-megapixel Ultra Wide, Wide and Telephoto cameras

mobile-phones.name: Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 256GB
mobile-phones.description: Latest iPhone model, but with bigger screen, 256GB storage capacity.
features: 6.5-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display
Water and dust resistance (4 metres for up to 30 minutes, IP68)
Triple-camera system with 12-megapixel Ultra Wide, Wide and Telephoto cameras

mobile-phones.name: Apple iPhone SE 128GB
mobile-phones.description: Not only small, but powerful, and affordable!
features: 4.7-inch Retina HD display
A13 Bionic chip with third-generation Neural Engine
12-megapixel Wide camera and 4K video

mobile-phones.name: Samsung Galaxy S20+ 5G 128GB
mobile-phones.description: 2020's Samsung Galaxy S20+ with incredible camera.
features: Quad rear camera with 30x Space Zoom & 8K video
6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED Infinity-O display with 120Hz refresh rate
Shoot night shots like a pro with twice the light*

mobile-phones.name: Samsung Galaxy Note10+ 256GB
mobile-phones.description: The Galaxy Note10+ comes with s-pen, which is fun to play with.

mobile-phones.name: Google Pixel 4 XL 128GB
mobile-phones.description: It’s built around the helpful Google software you know and love, which is always getting better.
features: Capture incredible colour in all your photos - even photos that you take using your favourite apps
Adjust the exposure balance of your photos before you take the shots
Get more done with your voice using the Google Assistant

laptops.name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch 512GB (Silver)
laptops.description: Powerful and not for everyone. Gamers are restricted :).
features: Ninth-generation 6-core Intel Core i7 processor
Stunning 16-inch Retina display with True Tone technology
Touch Bar and Touch ID

laptops.name: Dell Inspiron 14 5000 14-inch
laptops.description: 2-in-1 Touchscreen Laptop (10th Gen i5), TWO IN ONE? NICE!
features: 14.0-inch FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS LED-Backlit Touch Display
10th Generation Intel® Core™ i5-10210U Processor
512GB SSD Storage

laptops.name: Microsoft Surface Book 2 13.5-inch
laptops.description: 256GB SSD and 8th Gen i7, it's just outstanding.
features: The fastest Surface Book yet, with 2x more power
Up to 17 hours of battery life[1]
13.5-inch Vibrant PixelSense™ Display

Accessories.name: Samsung T5 500GB External SSD
Accessories.description: Portable SSD with USB Type-C connector.
features: Fast transfer speeds of up to 540MB/s
Compact, lightweight (51g) and shock-resistant from falls up to 2m
Optional password protection with AES 256-bit hardware encryption

Accessories.name: Sony WF-1000XM3 Noise Cancelling Earphones
features: Industry-leading noise cancellation
Up to 24 hours of listening
Headphones that react to you

Accessories.name: Apple AirPods Pro
Accessories.description: Compatible to every device, ESPECIALLY APPLES.
features: Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound
Transparency mode for hearing and connecting with the world around you
Three sizes of soft, tapered silicone tips for a customisable fit

Accessories.name: Belkin Wireless Charging Dock
Accessories.description: Say goodbye to tangling phone chargers!
features: Faster wireless charging for more devices
Qi-certified for full functionality with all Qi-enabled devices up to 10W
Uniquely designed stand supports landscape and portrait mode
